DocAttribute.Name: PredefinedType
DocAttribute.Documentation: Identifies the predefined type of a impact device. This type may associate additional specific property sets. > NOTE The _PredefinedType_ shall only be used, if no _IfcImpactProtectionDeviceType_ is assigned, providing its own _IfcImpactProtectionDeviceType_._PredefinedType_.

DocWhereRule.Name: CorrectPredefinedType
DocWhereRule.Documentation: Either the _PredefinedType_ attribute is unset(e.g. because an _IfcImpactProtectionDeviceType_ is associated), or the inherited attribute _ObjectType_ shall be provided, if the _PredefinedType_ is set to USERDEFINED.

DocWhereRule.Name: CorrectTypeAssigned
DocWhereRule.Documentation: Either there is no type object associated, i.e. the _IsTypedBy_ inverse relationship is not provided, or the associated type object has to be of type _IfcImpactProtectionDeviceType_.
